title: Workshop on Functional Training Program Design to Improve Physical Fitness in Elementary Students

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practice-centered course for pre-service teachers or physical education majors to strengthen competencies in developing functional training programs for elementary students.

learning_goals: Learners can design elementary school student-customized functional training programs using the ADDIE model.
Learners can propose three or more training methods to improve physical fitness components (strength, flexibility, endurance, etc.).
Learners can establish a blended class operation plan combining existing physical education curricula with functional training.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
